articles.description: The Skate series is back in the news. Now pro skater Jason Dill says he was approached last summer to appear in the game. The news follows rumors that EA might have abandoned the Skate trademark altogether.
articles.content:
At least one former professional skateboarder says hes been approached about a new video game in the Skate series. Jason Dill leaked the information during a recent episode of the podcast The Nine Club, which was first reported by Wccftech.
I got a call from… [+1983 chars]

articles.description: This year's Galaxy S phones are more expensive than ever, with even the cheapest S20 variant going for a thousand dollars. Samsung likely anticipated the
articles.content: This year's Galaxy S phones are more expensive than ever, with even the cheapest S20 variant going for a thousand dollars. Samsung likely anticipated the backlash those prices would get (and the company sure knows now), as it is also selling more budget Galax… [+6733 chars]

articles.author: Ben Kuchera
articles.title: Moving Out review: co-op silliness, with plenty of broken TVs - Polygon
articles.description: Moving Out is a ridiculously rowdy co-op game for up to four players who have to get everything out of a house, move it onto the truck, and if a few things get broken? It’s just the cost of doing business.
articles.content:
Ive been friends with the same group of folks since high school, and weve moved each others belongings from house to dorm to apartment to house to house to house more times than I can count. 
Youd think wed have it down to a science by now, but, as my friend… [+5030 chars]

articles.title: Amazon's free-to-play hero shooter 'Crucible' arrives May 20th - Engadget
articles.description: Amazon's first AAA title will be available via Steam.
articles.content:
There'll be three modes at the outset. Heart of the Hives pits two four-player teams against each other as well as large boss hives that pop up throughout the map. Each hive contains a heart, and the first team to snag three wins the game. 
In Harvester Comm… [+939 chars]

articles.title: iPhone sales got hit by coronavirus. But Apple has a plan - CNET
articles.description: Apple earlier warned that the pandemic has affected its sales. But the tech giant did eke out some wins.
articles.content:
We're just starting to understand the economic toll of the coronavirus.
Angela Lang/CNET

articles.title: See The BMW 2 Series Gran Coupe M235i Go Flat Out On The Autobahn - Motor1
articles.description: The swoopy sedan topped out at 161 mph.
articles.content: One badge, completely different cars. Were talking about the M235i and how it means a tail-happy coupe to some and a front-wheel-drive-based sedan to others. BMWs M range used to be all about actual full-fat M cars, but in recent years it has blossomed to inc… [+1637 chars]
